name: Jonha Fort
description: Historic fort near Jonha waterfall in Ranchi district.
longDescription: Jonha Fort, located near the famous Jonha Falls, was built centuries ago and offers panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. It is a popular spot for history enthusiasts and trekkers.
history: Constructed during medieval times as a defensive fortification.
importance: Historic and architectural significance, trekking destination.
speciality: Combination of fort history and natural beauty.

name: Kanke Fort
description: Old fort built during British era near Ranchi.
longDescription: Kanke Fort was originally constructed during the British colonial period. Today, it is a heritage site surrounded by greenery and is popular for short excursions.

name: Palamu Forts
description: Twin historic forts in Palamu district.
longDescription: The Palamu Forts, comprising two ancient forts, are renowned for their architectural beauty and strategic locations. Surrounded by forest, they are perfect for trekking and photography.
history: Built in the 17th century by local rulers.
speciality: Twin forts with panoramic views and historic legacy.

name: Hundru Fort
longDescription: Hundru Fort is a small medieval fort located close to Hundru Falls. It attracts visitors interested in history, architecture, and natural scenery.
history: Built during the medieval period for local rulers.
speciality: Historic fort with nearby waterfall view.

name: Rajrappa Fort
longDescription: Rajrappa Fort stands near the Rajrappa Temple area, overlooking the confluence of rivers. Though partially in ruins, it provides insight into the region's medieval architecture.
history: Constructed centuries ago as a defensive structure.
speciality: Fort ruins with river confluence view.

name: Chapra Fort
description: Ancient fort located in Chapra region.
longDescription: Chapra Fort is a historic fort built on elevated terrain, offering strategic vantage points. It is an interesting destination for history buffs and trekkers.
history: Built during medieval times for military purposes.

name: Jamshedpur Fort
longDescription: Jamshedpur Fort was built centuries ago and now serves as a cultural landmark. It showcases traditional architecture and is surrounded by urban development.
history: Medieval fort adapted by local rulers.
speciality: Historic fort in modern city surroundings.

name: Deoghar Fort
description: Small fort in Deoghar district with historic value.
longDescription: Deoghar Fort, though modest in size, holds historical importance. Visitors can explore the site while enjoying the surrounding scenic views.
history: Built during medieval times by local rulers.
